text: 18.79 While change of use applications are not specifically exempt, the majority of types of change of use applications will be exempt through the de minimis habitat exemption. 18.80 The latest Tower Hamlets Local Biodiversity Action Plan gives details of priority habitats and/or features for priority species (see parts 1 and 2). Features of biodiversity or ecological value include: a. linear corridors, such as watercourses, hedgerows and buffer zones; b. veteran trees; c. old hedges; and d. habitats or species identified as local, London or national priorities, and features which might support such species. BACK TO POLICIES 18.81 Where geographically relevant, the Thames River Basin Management Plan objectives should also be incorporated.
